deepseek_optimized_prompt:
**AI Image Generation Prompt:**  

"Professional product photo of a sleek, modern black travel suitcase (56cm x 40cm x 23cm, 22kg capacity) with two smooth-rolling wheels and an ergonomic retractable handle. The suitcase at a slight angle to showcase its dimensions, placed on a clean, polished surface with a subtle reflective finish. Use soft, diffused lighting to highlight the texture and sheen of the material while avoiding harsh shadows. The background should be a minimalist, neutral-toned studio setup—light gray or soft beige—to emphasize the product’s elegance. Add a faint blur effect to the background for depth. The mood is sophisticated yet dynamic, conveying adventure and reliability. Include a tagline overlay: *'Sleek, durable, and ready for adventure—your perfect travel companion with 22kg capacity. Travel in style, hassle-free!'* in a modern sans-serif font. Style: high-end e-commerce, crisp details,
